title: Decolonizing Large-Scale Digital Learning Spaces: Reconstructing Awareness Through Reflective Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic digital learning environments and science subject matter knowledge
context.additional_context: Experience in analyzing cultural biases when designing digital content for science subjects.

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more cultural biases in digital learning spaces.
Through reflective essay writing, learners can analyze the impact of their positionality on learning design.
Propose two or more improvement plans for science digital content based on decolonization principles.

resources: Decolonized Learning Design Case Study Database

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
